entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour's murder is mentioned in the text. The official version of his death is that he resigned.

entities.name: pius thicknesse
entities.description: Pius Thicknesse has been replaced Scrimgeour and is under the Imperius Curse.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is effectively the Minister of Magic, but he doesn't need to declare himself. He uses Pius Thicknesse as his puppet.

relationships.description: Voldemort is using Pius Thicknesse as his puppet to take care of everyday business at the Ministry.
